short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An app for searching and tracking stocks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Empowers your stock investments to be smarter and more efficient than ever. With this app, you can effortlessly retrieve stock price information by simply dragging and selecting text. Stay updated with real-time stock market fluctuations.
